title: Extreme Measures (1996) Hugh Grant  (DVDrip, opt.subs RU+BLG)
description:
<a href="http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0116259/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0116259/</a>

Optional subtitles in separate idx/sub files: Russian, Bulgarian. (Work in 
Windows Media Player etc. - see enclosed Note)

With Sarah Jessica Parker and Gene Hackman.

"Not all surgery is intended to cure"

Rare film with Hugh Grant in a thriller: A British doctor working at a hospital 
in New York starts investigating when the body of a man who died in his 
emergency room disappears. The doctor soon finds himself in danger from people 
who want the hospital's dark secrets to remain undiscovered.

I was surprised that I could not find any good DVDrip for this good film on the 
net, so I made one for you. Thanks to the uploader who provided the Russian DVD 
with the original English soundtrack intact. It had only Russian and Bulgarian 
subtitles, so I include them to return the favor.

Widescreen DVDrip XviD 2-pass 704x272, great stereo sound AC3.
Runs well in both my standalone DivX players.

My new ripping procedure now produces decent quality for such a long film 
compressed into just 700 MiB. I enclose a sample for ye weak in faith.
